column1: dialectal forms recorded in dialectological notation  ցամաք ‎(cʿamakʿ) Agulis, Akhaltsikhe, Goris, Ararat, Harput, Erzurum, Karabakh, Maragheh, Nakhichevan-on-Don, Shamakhi, Constantinople, New Julfa, Tekirdağ, Sivas, Salmas, Suceava, Tbilisi  ցամաքյ ‎(cʿamakʿy) Van  ցամաք ‎(cʿamakʿ), ցամաʾ ‎(cʿamaʾ) Aslanbeg  ցա̈մաքյ ‎(cʿämakʿy) Moks  ցա̈մա̈ք ‎(cʿämäkʿ) Diyarbakir  ցամակ ‎(cʿamak) Eleşkirt, Muş  ցօմաք ‎(cʿōmakʿ) Hemşin  ցամօք ‎(cʿamōkʿ) Haçin  ցամոք ‎(cʿamokʿ), ցամօք ‎(cʿamōkʿ) Zeitun  ցա̈մո̈ւք ‎(cʿämükʿ) Svedia
